experience.job_description: Lead a team software engineers in the development and implementation of Enterprise Resource Planning applications for SMEs. Work with project managers to allocate and assign projects and tasks to employees. Identify and form key partnerships to grow the company.Develop and deploy software tools for company-wide operations. Handle budgeting, optimize cost of production, analyze and optimize team performance. Create and build company culture and influence staff by it.

Developed and maintain the website of the hospital. Implementation, deployment and management of Hospital Management Systems for handling patients and resources of the facility. Liaise with medical professionals to design efficient patient intake and discharge procedures using digital Electronic Medical Record systems. Train and assist new staff on how to use the Electronic Medical Record systems.

Developed and maintained enterprise resource management software that helped the company in the recruitment of thousands of mobile money agents for banks. Set up and maintained Google cloud servers for handling company emails. Trained and assisted staff on how to use digital systems in the workplace. Produced and communicated budgets with key stakeholders for technology implementation or optimisation.Developed and maintain the website of the hospital. Implementation, deployment and management of Hospital Management Systems for handling patients and resources of the facility. Liaise with medical professionals to design efficient patient intake and discharge procedures using digital Electronic Medical Record systems. Train and assist new staff on how to use the Electronic Medical Record systems.
Developed websites and web applications for clients across multiple countries (United States, United Kingdom and Ghana) as a freelancer.

Handled networking of computers and internet connectivity. Implemented and managed a captive portal for time logging and internet browsing fees collection. Repaired hardware problems with computers in the cafe and also for visiting clients.

education.course_title: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
Diploma of Technology in Business Administration

projects.name: Medicon Health Telemedicine Platform
projects.description:
Medicon Health is a telemedicine platform that affords users access to medical services including, medical consultations, pharmacy services and laboratory services digitally.

Features: Authentication, doctor profiles, pharmacy, prescription scanning, video and voice consultations, order management, booking, Point of Sale and drug delivery tracking.

Technology stack: Flutter, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Firebase, Google Cloud services and Agora.

projects.name: Strooptest cognitive analysis software
projects.description:
This project is a simple opensource program that relies on the stroop effect to analyse a person's capacity to pay attention.

It takes advantage of Google chrome's speech recognition engine to capture the pronounciation of colors displayed on the screen labelled with the name of other colors to calculate an attention score.

The goal of this project is to help neurospecialists and psychologists speed up diagnostics.

Technology stack: Python Flask, HTML, CSS, JQuery and Google Chrome speech recognition.

projects.name: TrustExpress smart courier app
projects.description:
Developed to enable intra-city courier services. The platform enables delivery bike riders receive requests from nearby customers requesting package delivery services. Rider does the pickup and delivers to the destination.

Features: Delivery requests by customers and on behalf of others, riders alerts by ringing, smart routing and navigation, price computations by distance and package parameters, remote tracking of rider.

Technology stack: Flutter, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Firebase, Google Cloud services and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

projects.name: BloodWork for medical laboratories
projects.description:
An opensource flutter mobile application to help medical laboratories receive lab requests from patients and doctors for home service sample collection and result transmission.

The goal of this project is to create a platform for people with mobility concerns to get access to laboratory services without the need to visit the lab.

The application started in FlutterFlow and then customised in pure flutter code.

Technology stack: Flutter and Firebase.

projects.name: Rokel airline ticket system setup
projects.description: Setup of airline ticket and hotel reservation system for travelers to compare prices and purchase airline tickets. They are allowed to also compare hotel prices from anywhere in the world and make reservations through affiliation with major booking platforms.

projects.name: Rokel shipment booking and tracking system
projects.description:
Designed and developed a shipment booking and tracking system to handle quotation generation and price comparisons for various freight services.

Features: Quotation generation with price comparisons, user authentication, booking, payment collection and shipping document generation.

Technology stack: PHP, Jquery, Firebase and WordPress for the homepage.

projects.name: Airban Enterprise Resource Planning
projects.description:
An Enterprise Resource Planning platform simplified for operating small to medium scale enterprises.

The platform handles sales, Human Resource, expense and budgeting, project management, accounting and other business activities.

Technology stack: Python, MySQL, Angular and Firebase.

projects.name: Getmybox subscription box mobile app
projects.description:
An Enterprise Resource Planning platform simplified for operating small to medium scale enterprises.

The platform handles sales, Human Resource, expense and budgeting, project management, accounting and other business activities.

Technology stack: Python, MySQL, Angular and Firebase.

projects.name: Healthcarology medical records app
projects.description:
Healthcarology is a medical application for personal health records. It keeps track of users health and enables instant access to insights by care providers.

Technology stack: Flutter, Python, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Firebase, Amazon Web Services, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

projects.name: Digital signage content management system
projects.description:
Signage CMS is a content management system to manage digital signages and displays accross an organisation through a Raspberry pi server.

It enables the delivery of important information to audience in realtime.

Features: Video manager and player, RSS feed integration, screen management, queue management, presentation and templates management.

Technology Stack: PHP Laravel and MySQL.
